title: The Syndicate: Four-Leaf Clover
description: Is green beer best reserved for green aliens? What sort of rings do leprechauns wear--and where? And, above all, Does Everybody Want To Shag The Irish--and what do you do about it if you're Welsh?St Patrick's Day novelette in the Syndicate series, previously published by Loose Id but now out of print in that edition. Futuristic erotic romance, romantic comedy, m/m, 9,000 words.
author: Jules Jones
